ud2.10:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā anupiyāyaṁ viharati ambavane.
ud2.10:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:2.1: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū āyasmato bhaddiyassa kāḷīgodhāya puttassa araññagatassapi rukkhamūlagatassapi suññāgāragatassapi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānentassa:
ud2.10:2.4: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho, āvuso, āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati, yaṁsa pubbe agāriyabhūtassa rajjasukhaṁ, so tamanussaramāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:3.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
ud2.10:3.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
ud2.10:3.3: “āyasmā, bhante, bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:3.5: Nissaṁsayaṁ kho, bhante, āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati.
ud2.10:3.6: Yaṁsa pubbe agāriyabhūtassa rajjasukhaṁ, so tamanussaramāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
ud2.10:4.2: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bhaddiyaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
ud2.10:5.1: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhaddiyaṁ kāḷīgodhāya puttaṁ etadavoca:
ud2.10:5.3: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
ud2.10:5.4: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ bhaddiyaṁ kāḷīgodhāya puttaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud2.10:6.1: “Saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhaddiya, araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:7.1: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, bhaddiya, atthavasaṁ sampassamāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud2.10:7.3: “Pubbe me, bhante, agāriyabhūtassa rajjaṁ kārentassa antopi antepure rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, bahipi antepure rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, antopi nagare rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, bahipi nagare rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, antopi janapade rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi, bahipi janapade rakkhā susaṁvihitā ahosi.
ud2.10:7.4: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, evaṁ rakkhito gopito santo bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkī utrāsī vihāsiṁ.
ud2.10:7.5: Etarahi kho panāhaṁ, bhante, araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi eko abhīto anubbiggo anussaṅkī anutrāsī appossukko pannalomo paradattavutto, migabhūtena cetasā viharāmi.
ud2.10:7.6: Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, atthavasaṁ sampassamāno araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi abhikkhaṇaṁ udānaṁ udānesiṁ:
ud2.10:8.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
